name: Plague 2054
description:
Plague 2054 is a text-based zombie survival game. 

The game requires the user to make choices to traverse through the story line.

The game includes the following:

- Countless choices.

- 3 different story lines.

- 14 different endings.

- 1 secret ending.

It is my first attempt at this genre of game development and I truly hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed creating it.

"Will you survive a day in Plague 2054?"
